---
title: "Distributions of the variables"
output: html_notebook
---
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

data <- read.csv(file='nbadata.csv')
df <- data.frame(data)
categorical_df <- df[ ,sapply(df, is.factor)]
categorical_df
```
```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(DATE))+
  geom_bar()
```
```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(HOME_TEAM))+
  geom_bar()
```
```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(AWAY_TEAM))+
  geom_bar()
```


```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(GAME_CLOCK))+
  geom_bar()

```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(SHOT_RESULT))+
  geom_bar()
```
```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(CLOSEST_DEFENDER))+
  geom_bar()
```
